title: Bloomberg Markets: Schwartz on Market for Big Baller Brand
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Schwartz on Market for Big Baller Brand
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Neil Schwartz Vice President of Business Development and Market Insights SportsOneSource Group Discussing Lavar Ball's Big Baller B-Ball brand and whether there is a market for ultra-high priced sneakers.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
